name: Mathematics
description: Mathematics is the study of the properties of numbers, quantities, and the relationships between them.

topics.name: Addition
topics.description: Addition is the process of adding two or more numbers together.

topics.name: Subtraction
topics.description: Subtraction is the process of taking one number from another.

topics.name: Multiplication
topics.description: Multiplication is the process of multiplying two or more numbers together.

topics.name: Division
topics.description: Division is the process of dividing one number by another.

name: Physics
description: Physics is the study of matter and its motion through space and time.

topics.name: Motion
topics.description: Motion is the movement of an object in a straight line.

topics.name: Gravity
topics.description: Gravity is the force of attraction between two objects.

topics.name: Electricity
topics.description: Electricity is the flow of electric charge through a conductor.

topics.name: Magnetism
topics.description: Magnetism is the force of attraction between two objects.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry is the study of matter and its properties, including its composition, structure, and behavior.

topics.name: Atoms
topics.description: Atoms are the smallest units of matter.

topics.name: Molecules
topics.description: Molecules are the smallest units of matter.

topics.name: Bonds
topics.description: Bonds are the relationships between atoms and molecules.

topics.name: Ions
topics.description: Ions are the smallest units of matter.

name: Biology
description: Biology is the natural science that studies life and living organisms.

topics.name: Animals
topics.description: Animals are living organisms.

topics.name: Plants
topics.description: Plants are living organisms.

topics.name: Microbes
topics.description: Microbes are living organisms.

topics.name: Fungi
topics.description: Fungi are living organisms.

name: English
description: English is the language of the world.

topics.name: Vocabulary
topics.description: Vocabulary is the study of words and their meanings.

topics.name: Grammar

topics.name: Reading
topics.description: Reading is the study of the meaning of words.

topics.name: Writing

name: History
